name: test_e2e_with_logs[093_SQLI_POLY_002]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_POLY_002` |
| **Name** | Oracle-specific polyglot injection |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | polyglot |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `'||UTL_INADDR.get_host_name((select user from dual))||'`
- **Encoded**: `%27%7C%7CUTL_INADDR.get_host_name%28%28select%20user%20from%20dual%29%29%7C%7C%27`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~62000ms
- **Timestamp**: 08:20:16.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Error-based SQL Injection` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Error-based SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_POLY_002-1772266816373-di5fq5 pattern_id=SQLI_POLY_002 uri=/?q=%27%7C%7CUTL_INADDR.get_host_name%28%28select%20user%20from%20dual%29%29%7C%7C%27 client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Error-based SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_POLY_002-1772266816373-di5fq5 pattern_id=SQLI_POLY_002 uri=/?q=%27%7C%7CUTL_INADDR.get_host_name%28%28select%20user%20from%20dual%29%29%7C%7C%27 client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
